name: The Glitch (Joshua 🐢)
description:
This is a story based game made for the Godot Game Jam and for fun.

 A girl wakes up to find herself being experimented on. Just as she abandons all hope. A glitch rescues her and kills the scientist. The glitch leaves instructions all the floor on how to find her way out... but all is not how it seems.

Recommended : Read the story in the main menu 

The game may look like its pretty hard at first, but when you find the glitches *cough*And Unintentional Glitches*cough*  everything will be fine.

Just survive, be a SURVIVOR.

CLICK FOR SPOILER ! COME HERE IF YOU CAN'T FIGURE OUT THE FINAL GLITCH AFTER PLAYING Click on survivor to survive in the trap level
